tool_description: Calculates optimal routes to water sources considering terrain difficulty, energy expenditure, and safety factors for efficient water procurement planning.

terrain_difficulty.description: Overall terrain: easy, moderate, difficult, very_difficult, extreme

traveler_fitness.description: Physical capability: poor, fair, good, excellent

carrying_capacity_kg.description: Maximum carry weight in kilograms (1 to 50)

error_messages: Invalid current coordinates: Latitude must be -90 to 90, longitude must be -180 to 180.
Empty water source coordinates: Must provide at least one water source location.
Invalid terrain difficulty: Use one of [easy, moderate, difficult, very_difficult, extreme].
Invalid fitness level: Use one of [poor, fair, good, excellent].
Carrying capacity out of range: Weight must be between 1 and 50 kilograms.
Invalid coordinate format: Water source coordinates must be in 'latitude,longitude' format.
usage: Provide current location, water source coordinates, and terrain assessment. Optionally specify fitness level and carrying capacity for personalized route optimization.

recommended_source.description: GPS coordinates of optimal water source

energy_expenditure.description: Energy cost: minimal, low, moderate, high, extreme

alternative_sources.description: Backup water source options with distances
